response.overview: Documentary that records the activities of a group of elementary school children in the "Art and Recycling" workshop, held in the summer of 2024. Guided by teachers, the students learn to reduce, recycle, and reuse through games and the creation of objects from recovered materials. The film follows them on field trips to the Tigre Delta, where they observe the biodiversity and the need to protect the ecosystem. Back at home, they apply what they have learned through actions such as turning off lights and saving water.
response.title: Patrulla del clima
